description: This API is in preview release for Amazon Connect and is subject to change. Describes an agent status.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: AgentStatusId
parameters.description: The identifier for the agent status.

nested_items.name: AgentStatusARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the agent status.

nested_items.name: AgentStatusId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the agent status.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the agent status.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the agent status.

nested_items.name: DisplayOrder
nested_items.description: The display order of the agent status.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the agent status.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when this resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where this resource was last modified.
